name: Vivid Nightmares
description:
Can you sleep without being tormented by nightmares?

Vivid Nightmares is a short survival horror where you have to fall asleep while avoid getting captured by the nightmares that haunt your room.

Hide in the closet and turn on the lights to protect from the nightmares, but remember that your sanity will deteriorate more and more.

Can you beat all the 4 difficulty levels? There is only one way to find out... Download it now for free!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Default Movement

E - Interact with the Environment

C - Close your eyes

SPACE - Stop peeking at the door/Get out of the closet/Get off the bed
